title: auto repair while loading games
body:
So basically, while the game is loading, it will automatically close just for a auto repair cause it detected broken files or something like that. Afterwards, you wouldn't be able to reconnect anymore and will get a leavebuster. At the moment I'm writing this, it just happened and lost LP. Can't Riot make it that when it happens to you, if you can't reconnect, make the others also leave the game but no one will lose anything. This is really unfair cause I lose LP that I work for, get a leavebuster and have to wait for the game to fix itself. This happened several times before and it's really unfair. 

Please Riot, do something about this.

replies.body: There's not a whole lot we can do when one person leaves the match when their client crashed, we can however guide you through some steps that should help stop that from happening again. Just to be safe, I would grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **Force Repatch**.
